title: League stops answering right after champ select, forces me to reboot.
body:
Sometimes after champ select, the screen would get black and never show the loading screen, 
I try to close league of legends and restart but it just tells me the programm stopped answering and I have to wait (forever)
So I end up rebooting  and of course I lose the game because the whole process takes too much time and the game has already been remade.
This is okey most of the times, but when I play ranked I just lose LP and I even get placed into a lower priority queue because of that.

Is this a client bug ( I'm on the new client), or does that have to do with my PC ?

replies.body: It sounds like your connection is having problems reaching the game server, which is further affirmed by the black screen failing to download assets.  I suggest running through the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Let me know if you have any questions!
